      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>Use-after-free in function CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar<span class="line"><!---->Use-after-free in function CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: Version 114.0.5733.0 (Developer Build) (64-bit)<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: Version 114.0.5733.0 (Developer Build) (64-bit)<!----></span><br>Operating System: Windows 11<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 11<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Enable XFA in chrome://flags<span class="line"><!---->1. Enable XFA in chrome://flags<!----></span><br>2. open file poc.pdf<span class="line"><!---->2. open file poc.pdf<!----></span><br>3. click to ComboBox on the first page and press `Space` key <span class="line"><!---->3. click to ComboBox on the first page and press `Space` key <!----></span><br><br>DETAIL INFORMATION<span class="line"><!---->DETAIL INFORMATION<!----></span><br>In function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`<span class="line"><!---->In function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>bool CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar(uint16_t nChar, Mask<FWL_EVENTFLAG> nFlag) {<span class="line"><!---->bool CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar(uint16_t nChar, Mask&lt;FWL_EVENTFLAG&gt; nFlag) {<!----></span><br>  if (!m_pList)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!m_pList)<!----></span><br>    return false;<span class="line"><!---->    return false;<!----></span><br><br>  if (!m_pEdit)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!m_pEdit)<!----></span><br>    return false;<span class="line"><!---->    return false;<!----></span><br><br>  // In a combo box if the ENTER/SPACE key is pressed, show the combo box<span class="line"><!---->  // In a combo box if the ENTER/SPACE key is pressed, show the combo box<!----></span><br>  // options.<span class="line"><!---->  // options.<!----></span><br>  switch (nChar) {<span class="line"><!---->  switch (nChar) {<!----></span><br>    case pdfium::ascii::kReturn:<span class="line"><!---->    case pdfium::ascii::kReturn:<!----></span><br>      SetPopup(!IsPopup());<span class="line"><!---->      SetPopup(!IsPopup());<!----></span><br>      SetSelectText();<span class="line"><!---->      SetSelectText();<!----></span><br>      return true;<span class="line"><!---->      return true;<!----></span><br>    case pdfium::ascii::kSpace:<span class="line"><!---->    case pdfium::ascii::kSpace:<!----></span><br>      // Show the combo box options with space only if the combo box is not<span class="line"><!---->      // Show the combo box options with space only if the combo box is not<!----></span><br>      // editable<span class="line"><!---->      // editable<!----></span><br>      if (!HasFlag(PCBS_ALLOWCUSTOMTEXT)) {<span class="line"><!---->      if (!HasFlag(PCBS_ALLOWCUSTOMTEXT)) {<!----></span><br>        if (!IsPopup()) {<span class="line"><!---->        if (!IsPopup()) {<!----></span><br>          SetPopup(/*bPopUp=*/true);<span class="line"><!---->          SetPopup(/*bPopUp=*/true);<!----></span><br>          SetSelectText();<span class="line"><!---->          SetSelectText();<!----></span><br>        }<span class="line"><!---->        }<!----></span><br>        return true;<span class="line"><!---->        return true;<!----></span><br>      }<span class="line"><!---->      }<!----></span><br>      break;<span class="line"><!---->      break;<!----></span><br>    default:<span class="line"><!---->    default:<!----></span><br>      break;<span class="line"><!---->      break;<!----></span><br>...<span class="line"><!---->...<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>We can setup to run JS callback by calling to function `SetPopup`. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <span class="line"><!---->We can setup to run JS callback by calling to function `SetPopup`. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <!----></span><br>We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<span class="line"><!---->We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<!----></span><br><br>BISECT<span class="line"><!---->BISECT<!----></span><br>The vulnerable code was added in this commit: <span class="line"><!---->The vulnerable code was added in this commit: <!----></span>https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614"><!---->https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614<!----></a><br>It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <span class="line"><!---->It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <!----></span><br><br>PATCH<span class="line"><!---->PATCH<!----></span><br>Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <span class="line"><!---->Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <!----></span><br>```<span         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        This issue requires additional review before it can be merged to the LTS channel. Please answer the following questions to help us evaluate this merge:<span class="line"><!---->This issue requires additional review before it can be merged to the LTS channel. Please answer the following questions to help us evaluate this merge:<!----></span><br><br>1. Number of CLs needed for this fix and links to them.<span class="line"><!---->1. Number of CLs needed for this fix and links to them.<!----></span><br>2. Level of complexity (High, Medium, Low - Explain)<span class="line"><!---->2. Level of complexity (High, Medium, Low - Explain)<!----></span><br>3. Has this been merged to a stable release? beta release?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has this been merged to a stable release? beta release?<!----></span><br>4. Overall Recommendation (Yes, No)<span class="line"><!---->4. Overall Recommendation (Yes, No)<!----></span><br><br><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        This bug has been closed for more than 14 weeks. Removing security view restrictions.<span class="line"><!---->This bug has been closed for more than 14 weeks.       VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>Use-after-free in function CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar<span class="line"><!---->Use-after-free in function CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: Version 114.0.5733.0 (Developer Build) (64-bit)<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: Version 114.0.5733.0 (Developer Build) (64-bit)<!----></span><br>Operating System: Windows 11<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 11<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Enable XFA in chrome://flags<span class="line"><!---->1. Enable XFA in chrome://flags<!----></span><br>2. open file poc.pdf<span class="line"><!---->2. open file poc.pdf<!----></span><br>3. click to ComboBox on the first page and press `Space` key <span class="line"><!---->3. click to ComboBox on the first page and press `Space` key <!----></span><br><br>DETAIL INFORMATION<span class="line"><!---->DETAIL INFORMATION<!----></span><br>In function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`<span class="line"><!---->In function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`<!----></span><br><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>bool CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar(uint16_t nChar, Mask<FWL_EVENTFLAG> nFlag) {<span class="line"><!---->bool CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar(uint16_t nChar, Mask&lt;FWL_EVENTFLAG&gt; nFlag) {<!----></span><br>  if (!m_pList)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!m_pList)<!----></span><br>    return false;<span class="line"><!---->    return false;<!----></span><br><br>  if (!m_pEdit)<span class="line"><!---->  if (!m_pEdit)<!----></span><br>    return false;<span class="line"><!---->    return false;<!----></span><br><br>  // In a combo box if the ENTER/SPACE key is pressed, show the combo box<span class="line"><!---->  // In a combo box if the ENTER/SPACE key is pressed, show the combo box<!----></span><br>  // options.<span class="line"><!---->  // options.<!----></span><br>  switch (nChar) {<span class="line"><!---->  switch (nChar) {<!----></span><br>    case pdfium::ascii::kReturn:<span class="line"><!---->    case pdfium::ascii::kReturn:<!----></span><br>      SetPopup(!IsPopup());<span class="line"><!---->      SetPopup(!IsPopup());<!----></span><br>      SetSelectText();<span class="line"><!---->      SetSelectText();<!----></span><br>      return true;<span class="line"><!---->      return true;<!----></span><br>    case pdfium::ascii::kSpace:<span class="line"><!---->    case pdfium::ascii::kSpace:<!----></span><br>      // Show the combo box options with space only if the combo box is not<span class="line"><!---->      // Show the combo box options with space only if the combo box is not<!----></span><br>      // editable<span class="line"><!---->      // editable<!----></span><br>      if (!HasFlag(PCBS_ALLOWCUSTOMTEXT)) {<span class="line"><!---->      if (!HasFlag(PCBS_ALLOWCUSTOMTEXT)) {<!----></span><br>        if (!IsPopup()) {<span class="line"><!---->        if (!IsPopup()) {<!----></span><br>          SetPopup(/*bPopUp=*/true);<span class="line"><!---->          SetPopup(/*bPopUp=*/true);<!----></span><br>          SetSelectText();<span class="line"><!---->          SetSelectText();<!----></span><br>        }<span class="line"><!---->        }<!----></span><br>        return true;<span class="line"><!---->        return true;<!----></span><br>      }<span class="line"><!---->      }<!----></span><br>      break;<span class="line"><!---->      break;<!----></span><br>    default:<span class="line"><!---->    default:<!----></span><br>      break;<span class="line"><!---->      break;<!----></span><br>...<span class="line"><!---->...<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>We can setup to run JS callback by calling to function `SetPopup`. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <span class="line"><!---->We can setup to run JS callback by calling to function `SetPopup`. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <!----></span><br>We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<span class="line"><!---->We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<!----></span><br><br>BISECT<span class="line"><!---->BISECT<!----></span><br>The vulnerable code was added in this commit: <span class="line"><!---->The vulnerable code was added in this commit: <!----></span>https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614"><!---->https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614<!----></a><br>It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <span class="line"><!---->It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <!----></span><br><br>PATCH<span class="line"><!---->PATCH<!----></span><br>Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <span class="line"><!---->Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus() {<span class="line"><!---->void CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus() {<!----></span><br>  if (!SetPopup(false))<span class="line"><!---->  if (!SetPopup(false))<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  CPWL_Wnd::KillFocus();<span class="line"><!---->         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.       <mr-description></mr-description>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br>Use-after-free in function CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar<span class="line"><!---->Use-after-free in function CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar<!----></span><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: Version 114.0.5733.0 (Developer Build) (64-bit)<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: Version 114.0.5733.0 (Developer Build) (64-bit)<!----></span><br>Operating System: Windows 11<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Windows 11<!----></span><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <span class="line"><!---->We can setup to run JS callback by calling to function `SetPopup`. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <!----></span><br>We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<span class="line"><!---->We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<!----></span><br><br>BISECT<span class="line"><!---->BISECT<!----></span><br>The vulnerable code was added in this commit: <span class="line"><!---->The vulnerable code was added in this commit: <!----></span>https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614"><!---->https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614<!----></a><br>It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <span class="line"><!---->It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <!----></span><br><br>PATCH<span class="line"><!---->PATCH<!----></span><br>Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <span class="line"><!---->Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <!----></span><br>```<span         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <span class="line"><!---->We can setup to run JS callback by calling to function `SetPopup`. In JS function, we can free `CPWL_ComboBox` object and it is used again when back to function `CPWL_ComboBox::OnChar`. <!----></span><br>We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<span class="line"><!---->We can see that application crash in function `SetSelectText`, when it tries to get a field inside freed `CPWL_ComboBox` object.<!----></span><br><br>BISECT<span class="line"><!---->BISECT<!----></span><br>The vulnerable code was added in this commit: <span class="line"><!---->The vulnerable code was href="https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614"><!---->https://pdfium-review.googlesource.com/c/pdfium/+/68614<!----></a><br>It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <span class="line"><!---->It tried to add enter/space key press events on ComboBox but forgot that function `SetPopup` need to check returned value to avoid UAF. <!----></span><br><br>PATCH<span class="line"><!---->PATCH<!----></span><br>Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <span class="line"><!---->Should add a check returned value after calling function `SetPopup`, like in function `CPWL_ComboBox::KillFocus()`: <!----></span><br>```<span <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>3eb3c4d77d4f9372f77aa4895b85a1d4e4755c89<a class="undefined" target="_blank" May 11 19:48:37 2023<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu May 11 19:48:37 2023<!----></span><br><br>Always check return code from CPWL_ComboBox::SetPopup().<span class="line"><!---->Always check return code from CPWL_ComboBox::SetPopup().<!----></span><br><br>Operation must not continue when false is returned.<span class="line"><!---->Operation must not continue when false is returned.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: chromium:1444238<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1444238" title="Security: PDFium (XFA) Use-after-free in         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        LTS Milestone M108<span class="line"><!---->LTS Milestone M108<!----></span><br><br>This issue has been flagged as a merge candidate for Chrome OS' LTS channel. If selected, our merge team will handle any additional merges. To help us determine if this issue requires a merge to LTS, please answer this short questionnaire:<span class="line"><!---->This issue has been flagged as a merge candidate for Chrome OS' LTS channel. If selected, our merge team will handle any additional merges. To help us determine if this issue requires a merge to LTS, please answer this short questionnaire:<!----></span><br>1. Was this issue a regression for the milestone it was found in?<span class="line"><!---->1. Was this issue a regression for the milestone it was found in?<!----></span><br>2. Is this issue related to a change or feature merged after the latest LTS Milestone?<span class="line"><!---->2. Is this issue related to a change or feature merged after the latest LTS Milestone?<!----></span><br><br><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>

              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

    <mr-autocomplete vocabularyname="project" for="targetProjectInput" role="listbox" id="chops-autocomplete-1"><!---->
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>
      <div class="chops-autocomplete-container">
        <span class="screenreader-hidden" aria-live="polite">
          
        </span>
        <table hidden="">
          <tbody>
            
          </tbody>
        </table>
      </div>
    <!----></mr-autocomplete>

        for LitElement.

      </button>

          <chops-button class="de-emphasized discard-button">
            Discard
          </chops-button>
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
